amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 116-19 to highlight the gender pay gaps impact on women and girls of color during research and education efforts conducted by the Secretary of Labor.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Torres (CA) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mrs. Torres (CA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Torres (CA) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
